keyMoments.title: Steals the NHC10 Candy
keyMoments.description: Mocha makes the brave decision to steal all the NHC10 candy and run away with it to prevent her fellow children from consuming the deadly drug.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Mocha as a heroic character willing to risk everything to protect her friends.

keyMoments.title: Ultimate Self-Sacrifice
keyMoments.description: Cornered by the other addicted children, Mocha eats all of the NHC10 candy herself, sacrificing her own life to prevent her friends from taking the deadly drug.
keyMoments.significance: The emotional climax of the episode and one of the most heroic acts in the Punk Hazard arc. Demonstrates incredible courage from a 9-year-old child.
keyMoments.quote: I'm sorry everyone... I have to do this to protect you!

statusHistory.notes: Survived the NHC10 overdose with medical treatment

relationships.description: Mocha looks up to Nami as a 'big sister' figure and trusts her to help save the children.

evolutionMoments.description: Nami works desperately to protect Mocha and the other children from harm.

relationships.description: Mocha trusts Chopper as a doctor and friend who wants to help cure the children.

evolutionMoments.description: Chopper witnesses Mocha's sacrifice and faces an impossible choice trying to save her.

relationships.description: Fellow captive child on Punk Hazard. Mocha sacrifices herself to protect Sind and the other children.
Fellow captive child on Punk Hazard. Mocha sacrifices herself to protect Biyo and the other children.

reveals.information: Mocha possesses exceptional willpower and courage, able to resist NHC10 addiction long enough to make a heroic sacrifice
Willing to sacrifice her own life to protect her friends from the deadly candy

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Protecting the Children
keyMoments.description: Chopper works with Nami and Robin to prevent the addicted children from catching Mocha and harming themselves in their drug-fueled frenzy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Chopper's medical dedication and compassion as he tries to protect children from themselves.

keyMoments.title: Impossible Medical Dilemma
keyMoments.description: After Mocha's overdose, Chopper faces a heartbreaking triage decision: use his limited sedatives to calm the rampaging children or save Mocha who is dying from the massive overdose.
keyMoments.significance: Highlights Chopper's role as a doctor facing impossible ethical choices and limited resources.

keyMoments.title: Protecting the Children
keyMoments.description: Nami works with Robin and Chopper to prevent the addicted children from catching Mocha, showing her protective maternal instincts.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Nami's growth as a compassionate protector of the innocent.

keyMoments.title: Uses Milky Ball Technique
keyMoments.description: Nami demonstrates her weather manipulation technique 'Milky Ball' to create obscuring clouds that help control the situation with the children.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Nami's strategic use of her abilities for protection rather than combat.

abilities.description: Nami creates clouds using her Clima-Tact that can obscure vision and help control a situation.

keyMoments.title: Protecting the Children
keyMoments.description: Robin works with Nami and Chopper to prevent the addicted children from catching Mocha, using her abilities delicately to avoid harm.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Robin's compassion and precise control over her Devil Fruit powers.

keyMoments.title: Uses Cien Fleur: Dos Mano
keyMoments.description: Robin employs her Hana Hana no Mi ability 'Cien Fleur: Dos Mano' (Hundred Flowers: Two Hands) to create multiple hands to gently restrain the children.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's ability to use her combat powers for protection and care.

abilities.description: Robin creates one hundred arms using her Hana Hana no Mi powers, specifically forming two large hands for restraining or grappling.

keyMoments.title: Escapes Garbage Chute
keyMoments.description: Luffy and the unconscious Momonosuke manage to escape from the garbage chute, encountering Caesar's subordinates.
keyMoments.significance: Reunites Luffy with the main action and sets up confrontation with Caesar's forces.

keyMoments.title: Uses Conqueror's Haki
keyMoments.description: Luffy demonstrates his Conqueror's Haki to instantly knock out multiple hazmat-suited subordinates of Caesar.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's post-time skip growth and strategic use of Haki to efficiently eliminate weak opponents.

keyMoments.title: Flees Poison Gas with Tashigi
keyMoments.description: Zoro carries the injured Tashigi while running away from Caesar's deadly poison gas (Shinokuni), working to meet up with the rest of the group.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the unusual alliance between pirate Zoro and Marine Tashigi in the face of a common threat.

keyMoments.title: Escapes Poison Gas with Zoro
keyMoments.description: Tashigi is carried by Zoro as they flee from Caesar's deadly poison gas, showing the temporary alliance between Marine and pirate.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the unusual cooperation between traditional enemies when facing a greater threat.

relationships.description: Tashigi and Zoro have a complex relationship as Marine and pirate, but temporarily work together on Punk Hazard.

evolutionMoments.description: Zoro carries injured Tashigi to safety while fleeing poison gas.
